medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms developed suddenly at 9 PM. The patient had a bowel movement, with no emesis or fevers. There is no relation to food or recent unusual foods.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Possible seizure disorder treated with Depakote for an unspecified number of years. 2. Anxiety 3. Depression with suicide attempts 4. Positive PPD with negative CXR.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of seizures, febrile seizures, or developmental delay.
